TopicTitle: Connection node don't show up on the parts

Articles.Content:
when i add the connection node for parts in the config file they don't show up in game http://i.imgur.com/j9JUp27.png



node_stack_bottom = 0.0, -0.77, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0
node_stack_top = 0.0, 0.77, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0
node_attach = 0.0, 0.0, -0.75, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1

Edited April 10, 2014 by Mach_XXII

Please include the text of that part of the .cfg file. Should look similar to this:

node_attach =        0.00,  0.20, 0.00, 0.0,  1.0,  0.0, 1
node_stack_top =     0.00,  0.20, 0.00, 0.0,  1.0,  0.0, 0
node_stack_bottom =  0.00, -0.20, 0.00, 0.0, -1.0,  0.0, 0

Just by the picture, it looks like you're using node_attach (which is for surface attachment points) instead of node_stack (which is for the stacking attach method)
yeah, that last line should read node_stack instead of node_attach

yeah, that last line should read node_stack instead of node_attach

that changed nothing
Try moving the node_attach line to the top of the list. dunno if that will help at all, but can't hurt to try.
